data_description.id: The ID of the Citibike station.  Get the station ID from [Citibike's website](https://citibikenyc.com/explore). On the map, select the station and you will see `Site ID` at the bottom of the info card.
data_description.name: Optional name of the sensor. Default: citibike_station_[station name]

user.title: Configure Citibike
user.description: Set up a new Citibike station.
